english.segment1: Be everything, be all, be everything
english.segment2: come down and make me see, why I'll never be as good as you and all your.. broken thoughts your lengthy walks your knowing what to say, I'll be coming back around. right before you, right before you. (she told you so) no I don't think so
english.segment3: be everything that makes you scared when you stand and be so aware. this is it you're good to make such an entrance. do everything that makes you lie, it's only just a matter of time. before you get down and out.
english.segment4: so come down and make me an accident. make up some violence. this is no stage for your accidents. this is no stage for me to..
english.segment5: yea I told you so, yea I do think so
english.segment6: be everything that makes you scared when you stand and be so aware. this is it you're good to make such an entrance. do everything that makes you lie, it's only just a matter of time. before you get down and out
english.segment7: I don't think we'll ever get this, no I don't
english.segment8: be everything that makes you scared, when you're standing be so aware. this is it you're good to make such an entrance. do everything that makes you lie, it's only just a matter of time. before you get down and out..
